thread.title: Indian president in West Bank for talks
thread.title_full: Indian president in West Bank for talks | News24

author: news24.com
title: Indian president in West Bank for talks
text:
Ramallah - Indian President Pranab Mukherjee arrived in the West Bank on Monday for talks with Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas and Prime Minister Rami Hamdallah.
Mukherjee received an official welcoming ceremony at Abbas' headquarters in Ramallah and laid a wreath at the grave of late Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat, before starting talks with Abbas.
The visit comes amid a surge of violence in Jerusalem, the West Bank and Israel.
Mukherjee is scheduled to leave the West Bank on Tuesday and start a three-day visit to Israel, where he is due to meet his Israeli counterpart, Reuven Rivlin, and Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.
